00010 // Check against redundant including
00011 #ifndef TT_WAVETABLE_H
00012 #define TT_WAVETABLE_H
00013 
00014 // Include appropriate headers
00015 #include "tt_audio_base.h"
00016 #include "tt_buffer.h"
00017 
00018 
00019 /********************************************************
00020         CLASS INTERFACE/IMPLEMENTATION
00021 
00022         The entire class is implemented inline for speed.
00023  ********************************************************/
00024 
00025 class tt_wavetable:public tt_audio_base{
00026 
00027         private:
00028                 tt_attribute_value_discrete     mode;
00029                 tt_attribute_value                              frequency;
00030                 tt_attribute_value                              gain;
00031                 tt_buffer                                               *wavetable;
00032                 double                                                  index_delta;
00033                 double                                                  index;
00034                 
00035         
00036         public:
00037                 enum selectors{                                                                 // Attribute Selectors
00038                         k_frequency,
00039                         k_gain,
00040                         k_mode,
00041                         k_mode_sine,
00042                         k_mode_sine_mod,
00043                         k_mode_cos,
00044                         k_mode_cos_mod,
00045                         k_mode_square,
00046                         k_mode_square_mod,
00047                         k_mode_triangle,
00048                         k_mode_triangle_mod,
00049                         k_mode_ramp,
00050                         k_mode_ramp_mod,
00051                 };
00052                 
00053 
00054                 // OBJECT LIFE                                  
00055                 tt_wavetable()                                                                  // Constructor          
00056                 {
00057                         index = index_delta = 0.0;
00058                         wavetable = new tt_buffer(512);
00059                         //wavetable->set_attr(tt_buffer::k_length_samples, 512);
00060 
00061                         // set defaults
00062                         set_attr(k_mode, k_mode_sine);
00063                         set_attr(k_gain, 0.0);
00064                         set_attr(k_frequency, 1.0);
00065                 }
00066 
00067                 ~tt_wavetable()                                                                 // Destructor
00068                 {
00069                         delete wavetable;
00070                 }
00071 
00072 
00073                 // ATTRIBUTES
00074                 void set_attr(tt_selector sel, tt_attribute_value val)  // Set Attributes
00075                 {
00076                         switch (sel){
00077 
00078                                 case k_frequency:
00079                                         frequency = clip(double(val), 0.0, sr/2.0);
00080                                         index_delta = frequency * wavetable->get_attr(tt_buffer::k_length_samples) / sr;
00081                                         break;
00082                                         
00083                                 case k_mode:
00084                                         mode = (tt_attribute_value_discrete)val;
00085 
00086                                         if(val == k_mode_sine)
00087                                                 wavetable->fill(tt_buffer::k_sine);
00088                                         if(val == k_mode_sine_mod)
00089                                                 wavetable->fill(tt_buffer::k_sine_mod);
00090 
00091                                         if(val == k_mode_cos)
00092                                                 wavetable->fill(tt_buffer::k_cos);
00093                                         if(val == k_mode_cos_mod)
00094                                                 wavetable->fill(tt_buffer::k_cos_mod);
00095 
00096                                         if(val == k_mode_square)
00097                                                 wavetable->fill(tt_buffer::k_square);
00098                                         if(val == k_mode_square_mod)
00099                                                 wavetable->fill(tt_buffer::k_square_mod);
00100 
00101                                         if(val == k_mode_triangle)
00102                                                 wavetable->fill(tt_buffer::k_triangle);
00103                                         if(val == k_mode_triangle_mod)
00104                                                 wavetable->fill(tt_buffer::k_triangle_mod);
00105 
00106                                         if(val == k_mode_ramp)
00107                                                 wavetable->fill(tt_buffer::k_ramp);
00108                                         if(val == k_mode_ramp_mod)
00109                                                 wavetable->fill(tt_buffer::k_ramp_mod);
00110                                         break;
00111                                         
00112                                 case k_gain:
00113                                         gain = decibels_to_amplitude(val);
00114                                         break;
00115                         }
00116                 }
00117 
00118                 tt_attribute_value get_attr(tt_selector sel)                            // Get Attributes
00119                 {
00120                         switch (sel){
00121                                 case k_frequency:
00122                                         return frequency;
00123                                 case k_mode:
00124                                         return mode;
00125                                 case k_gain:
00126                                         return amplitude_to_decibels(gain);
00127                                 default:
00128                                         return 0.0;
00129                         }
00130                 }
00131                 
00132                 
00133                 // METHOD: SET_WAVETABLE
00134                 void set_wavetable(tt_buffer *newbuffer)
00135                 {
00136                         wavetable->set_buffer(newbuffer);
00137                 }
00138                 
00139                 
00140                 // DSP LOOP - WITHOUT MODULATION
00141                 void dsp_vector_calc(tt_audio_signal *out)
00142                 {
00143                         unsigned long p1, p2;
00144                         float diff;
00145                         double wavetable_length = double(wavetable->length_samples); //512.0
00146                         temp_vs = out->vectorsize;
00147                                                                         
00148                     while(temp_vs--){
00149 
00150                                 // Move the play head
00151                                 index += index_delta;
00152                                 
00153                                 // Wrap the play head
00154                                 if(index >= wavetable_length)                   
00155                                         index -= wavetable_length;
00156                                 else if(index < 0)                      
00157                                         index += wavetable_length;
00158                                 
00159                                 // table lookup (linear interpolation)  
00160                                 p1 = (unsigned long)index;
00161                                 p2 = p1 + 1;
00162                                 diff = index - p1;      
00163                                 p2 &= ((wavetable->length_samples) - 1);        // fast modulo
00164                                                                                 
00165                         *out->vector++ = ((wavetable->contents[p2] * diff) + (wavetable->contents[p1] * (1.0 - diff))) * gain;
00166                     }
00167                     out->reset();
00168                 }
00169 
00170                 
00171                 // DSP LOOP - WITH MODULATION INPUT
00172                 void dsp_vector_calc(tt_audio_signal *in, tt_audio_signal *out)
00173                 {
00174                         unsigned long p1, p2;
00175                         float diff, wavetable_length = float(wavetable->length_samples);
00176                         temp_vs = in->vectorsize;
00177                                                                                                 
00178                     while(temp_vs--){
00179 
00180                                 // Move the play head
00181                                 index += index_delta;
00182                                 
00183                                 // Apply modulation to the play head **
00184                                 index += *in->vector++ * wavetable_length / sr;
00185                                 
00186                                 // Wrap the play head
00187                                 if(index >= wavetable_length)                   
00188                                         index -= wavetable_length;
00189                                 else if(index < 0)                      
00190                                         index += wavetable_length;
00191                                 
00192                                 // table lookup (linear interpolation)  
00193                                 p1 = (unsigned long)index;
00194                                 p2 = p1 + 1;
00195                                 diff = index - p1;      
00196                                 p2 &= ((wavetable->length_samples) - 1);        // fast modulo
00197                                                                                 
00198                         *out->vector++ = ((wavetable->contents[p2] * diff) + (wavetable->contents[p1] * (1.0 - diff))) * gain;
00199                     }
00200                     in->reset(); out->reset();
00201                 }
00202                 
00203 };
00204 
00205 
00206 #endif          // TT_WAVETABLE_H
